title: A Small Door
description: A Small Door follows a Jewish family who flee their home in May 1940 when the Nazis invade Belgium. The novel recounts their months long search for safety, and a way out of Europe. Told through the eyes of nineteen year old Rachel and her scientist brother, Alexander, this harrowing story of loss and survival moves from Antwerp through Occupied France, Auschwitz, and beyond.
author: Michele Shulamit Lowy
